name: Web Development
description: Learn to build websites and web applications using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and React.

name: Data Science
description: Master data analysis, machine learning, and data visualization using Python, R, and SQL.

name: Digital Marketing
description: Learn SEO, SEM, content marketing, and social media strategies to grow businesses online.

name: Graphic Design
description: Learn to design visual content using tools like Adobe Photoshop, Illustrator, and InDesign.
